nested loop: 4 types:
type:1

11 12 13 14 15
21 22 23 24 25
31 32 33 34 35
41 42 43 44 45
51 52 53 54 55

type:2

15 14 13 12 11
25 24 23 22 21
35 34 33 32 31
45 44 43 42 41
55 54 53 52 51

home work: 3 & 4

type:3

51 52 53 54 55
41 42 43 44 45
31 32 33 34 35
21 22 23 24 25
11 12 13 14 15

type:4

55 54 53 52 51
45 44 43 42 41
35 34 33 32 31 
25 24 23 22 21
15 14 13 12 11
